director.name: 皮奥特尔·舒尔金 Piotr Szulkin

introduction: SBB (first known as Silesian Blues Band, later as Szukaj, Burz, Buduj – Polish for "Search, Break up, Build") is a Polish progressive rock band formed in 1971 in Siemianowice by multi-instrumentalist and vocalist Józef Skrzek. It was one of the most popular super-groups in Poland in the seventies; they also toured Czechoslovakia, Germany, Bulgaria, Sweden, Denmark and United States. The band split up in 1980 but was briefly re-activated in 1991, 1993, 1998 and finally in 2000.
